# k_update


Update the value of ``x`` to ``new_x``.




## Description

Update the value of ``x`` to ``new_x``.





## Usage
```r
k_update(x, new_x)
```




## Arguments


Argument      |Description
------------- |----------------
x | A ``Variable``.
new_x | A tensor of same shape as ``x``.





## Value

The variable ``x`` updated.
